definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
henpecked/to be under one's wife's thumb
wife, kids and a warm bed (idiom)/the simple and good life
pinyin: lao3 po2 hai2 zi5 re4 kang4 tou5

sentences.english: Shakespeare do thellos, hellos wife, blame, call names Shakespeare is more fiercer, crueler.
sentences.chinese: 莎士比亞如許做，老婆叱罵莎士比亞更厲害了。

sentences.english: So I had a wife, beautiful; like you.
sentences.chinese: 喔我以前有個老婆，很漂亮，就像你。

sentences.english: My wife keeps pecking at me.
sentences.chinese: 我老婆不斷地挑我的毛病。

sentences.english: Wife, is not good-looking, but net, delicious cheap.
sentences.chinese: 老婆，是刀魚，不好看，但好喫便宜啊。

sentences.english: In other words, "turtle" and wife must be unchaste .
sentences.chinese: 也就是說，“龜”的老婆一定是不貞潔的。

sentences.english: He buys fine pottery for his wife and takes long walks with her on Sunday afternoons.
sentences.chinese: 他給老婆買精緻的瓷器，星期天下午帶她散很長的步。
我叫莉莉，是達里加爾的老婆，瑪吉的媽。

sentences.english: Four gossips were chatting in a doorway.
sentences.chinese: 四個老婆子聚在一家大門口聊天。

sentences.english: His wife kept on at him to buy her a new coat.
sentences.chinese: 他老婆喋喋不休地嘮叨要他爲她買一件新襖子。
這個令人討厭的老婆子是誰？

sentences.english: One is afraid to beat his wife because his wife is likely to lose another of the lost earnings.
sentences.chinese: 其一是不敢打老婆，因爲很可能會賠了夫人又丟財。

sentences.english: Fang's wife drank the poison with no hesitation. The poisoned turned out to be a cup of vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 房的老婆毫不猶豫地把毒酒喝了，其實那這是一杯醋。

sentences.english: When I got back to my apartment, I heard the water running. My wife was in the shower.
sentences.chinese: 到家後，我聽見浴室裏有水流聲，是我老婆在洗澡。

sentences.english: Little had he thought that the old woman was just Hera herself .
sentences.chinese: 他並未想到此老婆婆竟然是赫拉本人。

sentences.english: My wife beat me on it.
sentences.chinese: 我老婆打了我的眼睛一拳。

sentences.english: This blind old lady relies completely on her walking stick to walk.
sentences.chinese: 這個瞎眼的老婆婆完全依靠柺棍走路。

definition: daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
